name: Praise Olarinde
description: Praise Olarinde is a Content Writer at Minuttia, an Organic Growth acceleration agency for B2B SaaS companies. His aim is to leverage storytelling to create immersive content you'd enjoy reading. You can call him 'le raconteur.
